sentences.sContent: Ambition is the seedling of genius, through love labor hands, in the fertile soil will become the strong sun.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ambition is the seedling of genius, through love labor hands, in the fertile soil will become the strong sun.
sentences.sCn: 志向是天才的幼苗，经过热爱劳动的双手的培育，在肥沃土里将成为粗壮的太阳。

sentences.sContent: Your lecture, it is so rich and colorful, your every word is like a long drought seedling get moist, we are under your moist, towering trees.
sentences.sContent_eng: Your lecture, it is so rich and colorful, your every word is like a long drought seedling get moist, we are under your moist, towering trees.
sentences.sCn: 您讲的课，是那样丰富多彩，您的每句话犹如久旱的树苗得到滋润，我们就是在您的滋润下，长成参天大树。

sentences.sContent: This process is as important as the watering and fertilizing the seedlings: without water and nourishment the seedling can never grow into a mature tree and yield any fruit.
sentences.sContent_eng: This process is as important as the watering and fertilizing the seedlings: without water and nourishment the seedling can never grow into a mature tree and yield any fruit.
sentences.sCn: 这一过程同样重要，如浇灌和施肥：没有水和营养，幼苗永远不能长成一棵成熟的树，并产生任何果实。

trans.tranOther: a young plant or tree grown from a seed
